column1: Sarn Athrad was the stony ford of the River Gelion across which the Dwarf-road of Beleriand from the Blue Mountains entered East Beleriand.
It was here that the Battle of Sarn Athrad took place between the Elves and Dwarves of Nogrod.
Sarn Athrad means "Ford of Stones"  or "stony ford" in Sindarin (sarn + athrad).
: Sarn Athrad (S. "Stony Ford") is an abandoned ford on what remains of the Gelion in Forlindon. It was replaced by Edenathrad (S. "New ford") a little north
column2: and a small village has been constructed nearby.
